analyzed: ▁bhikkhu ni um madd āpan asikkhāpad a

original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo bhikkhuniyā ummaddāpentipi parimaddāpentipi.
analyzed: ▁tena ▁kho ▁pana ▁samayena ▁bhikkhuniyo ▁bhikkhuniyā ▁ um madd āpent i pi ▁pari madd āpent i pi

original: Manussā vihāracārikaṁ āhiṇḍantā passitvā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: ▁manussā ▁vihār a cārik aṃ ▁ āhi ṇḍ antā ▁pass itvā ▁ujjhāy anti ▁khiyyanti ▁vi pā c enti

original: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo bhikkhuniyā ummaddāpessantipi parimaddāpessantipi, seyyathāpi gihiniyo kāmabhoginiyo”ti.

original: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
analyzed: ▁ ass o su ṃ ▁kho ▁bhikkhuniyo ▁tesaṃ ▁manuss ānaṃ ▁ujjhāy antānaṃ ▁kh iy yant ānaṃ ▁vi pā c entā naṃ

original: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—

analyzed: ▁kathañhi ▁nāma ▁bhikkhuniyo ▁bhikkhuniyā ▁ um madd ā p essanti pi ▁pari madd ā p essanti pīti ▁pe

original: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo bhikkhuniyā ummaddāpentipi parimaddāpentipī”ti?
analyzed: ▁saccaṃ ▁kira ▁bhikkhave ▁bhikkhuniyo ▁bhikkhuniyā ▁ um madd āpent i pi ▁pari madd āpent i pīti

original: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo bhikkhuniyā ummaddāpessantipi parimaddāpessantipi.
analyzed: ▁kathañhi ▁nāma ▁bhikkhave ▁bhikkhuniyo ▁bhikkhuniyā ▁ um madd ā p essanti pi ▁pari madd ā p essanti pi

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
“Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhuniyā ummaddāpeyya vā parimaddāpeyya vā, pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: ▁yā ▁pana ▁bhikkhunī ▁bhikkhuniyā ▁ um madd ā p eyya ▁vā ▁pari madd ā p eyya ▁vā ▁pācittiy anti
